Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.otplib

Class Conversation

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.kartoffelquadrat.otplib.Conversation
  • public class Conversation
extends Object
    Main access point for library users. Using this class lets you conveniently add new messages to a conversation, get the full plain history of exchanges messages and basic serializtion or restore functionality. Implementations of this class should be assiated to an immutable party, that corresponds to the user of the client software of this library. This ensures proper usage of chunk ids by the library user, without them having to bother about how to determine the next save chunk to use for encryption.
    Author:
    Maximilian Schiedermeier

    • Constructor Detail

      • Conversation

        public Conversation​(OneTimePad oneTimePad,
                    String party)
             throws InvalidPartyException
        Constructor to set up a new conversation. This associates a provided one time pad with a provided party (the library client user) and initiliazes a new, blank conversation.
        Parameters:
        oneTimePad - as the cryptographic material to be used for this conversation.
        party - as the identifier of the party adding plain messages to encrypt.
        Throws:
        InvalidPartyException - if the provided party string does not match the pad.

    • Method Detail

      • getConversationParty

        public String getConversationParty()
        Getter for the assocaited party.
        Returns:
        string array describing the party who can add plain messages to this conversation.

      • getEncryptedConversationHistory

        public List<EncryptedMessage> getEncryptedConversationHistory()
        Exports the encrypted entire message history.
        Returns:
        List of all emcrypted messages ever added to this conversation.

      • getPlainConversationHistory

        public List<PlainMessage> getPlainConversationHistory()
                                               throws CryptorException
        Exports the unencrypted counterpart of the entire message history.
        Returns:
        List of all plain messages ever added to this conversation.
        Throws:
        CryptorException - if decrypting the history failed.

      • encryptAndAddMessage

        public EncryptedMessage encryptAndAddMessage​(PlainMessage message)
                                      throws CryptorException
        GHelper method to add a plain message to the conversation. The method implementation automatically figures out the next chunk id to use to ensure message procetion and integrity.
        Parameters:
        message - as the plain message to add to the conversation.
        Returns:
        the encrypted counterpart of the added message.
        Throws:
        CryptorException - if encrypting the message failed.

      • getEncryptedMessagePreview

        public EncryptedMessage getEncryptedMessagePreview​(PlainMessage message)
                                            throws CryptorException
        Similar to previous message, but crates temporary preview of encrypted message without yet adding the resulting encrypted message to the internal store or burning the associated one chunk index. This method is meant to provide a preview of the encrypted message whiole th user is still composing their message.
        Parameters:
        message - as the plain message to encrypt.
        Returns:
        a preview of the resutling encrypted message, if the plain message were to be added.
        Throws:
        CryptorException - if the encryption of the plain message failed.

      • addEncryptedMessage

        public PlainMessage addEncryptedMessage​(EncryptedMessage encryptedMessage)
                                 throws CryptorException
        Adds an encrypted message to the internal store of conversations.
        Parameters:
        encryptedMessage - message that should be added to the history.
        Returns:
        plain message variant of the encrypted message.
        Throws:
        CryptorException - if the encryption of the plain message failed.

      • serializeEncryptedMessagesToJson

        public String serializeEncryptedMessagesToJson()
        Returns a json string version of the full encrypted conversation history. Internal messages are stored encrypted and in an ASCII compatible hexcode representation.
        Returns:
        Json string representation of an array of encrypted messages.

      • restore

        public static Conversation restore​(String serializedEncryptedMessages,
                                   String party,
                                   OneTimePad oneTimePad)
                            throws InvalidPartyException,
                                   OneTimePadMissmatchException
        Restores a previously exported conversation back to a java object. Useful for loading a conversation from disk on program startup.
        Parameters:
        serializedEncryptedMessages - json string representing an array of encrypted messages.
        party - owner of this conversation.
        oneTimePad - the key material used for this conversation.
        Returns:
        conversation as a java object.
        Throws:
        InvalidPartyException - if the provided party does not match the one time pad.
        OneTimePadMissmatchException - if there is a mismatch between the provided pad and conv.
